data.text: Bitcoin continues to push against resistance around $42k and a confirmed break should see $45k come back into play quickly.

data.title: Bitcoin (BTC) on-Chain Analysis: Realized Profits Spike Considerably in March
data.text: Be[in]Crypto takes a look at on-chain indicators for BTC, more specifically the realized profit, realized loss and their derivatives. The post Bitcoin (BTC) on-Chain Analysis: Realized Profits Spike Considerably in March appeared first on BeInCrypto.
